title: Cardamom and white chocolate sponge
description: Cardamom with white chocolate is a surprisingly good combination in a sponge cake. Equipment: You will need two 20cm/8in loose-bottomed sandwich tins, and a dove-shaped stencil to decorate.
ingredients: 225g/8oz unsalted butter, softened, plus extra for greasing
icing sugar and dove stencil, to decorate (optional)
